tasks.task: Dug soak pits to recharge groundwater.
subtasks: Selected site near Dhaman Khel mountain.
Collaborated with wife Swati for project.
Dug 70 soak pits covering 412 meters.
Facilitated water absorption during rainfall (upto 8 lakh liters).

tasks.task: Created an oxygen park by planting trees.
subtasks: Involved public support for tree planting.
Planted over 500 trees on the mountain.
Enhanced air quality and prevented soil erosion.

tasks.task: Addressed wildfire risk with grass management.
subtasks: Cut dry grass into small patches.
Established barriers to prevent fire spread.
Identified and cleared silt from structures.
Involved local youth in maintenance efforts.
